summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2298, for the improvement of 18th Avenue North, form the south line of East Roy Street to the north line of East Galer Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by the attaching of cross arms, which will accommodate a 3 ball cluster light system, to the poles ordered to be installed on said streets by the provisions of Ordinance No. 21598.
